Class PolicyStoreLoadException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.hippikon.security.PolicyStoreLoadException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class PolicyStoreLoadException
extends java.lang.Exception

Signals that the PolicyStore could not be loaded for a ProtectedResource access within a AuthorizationContext.

Since:
JDK 1.2.2
